meanings.definition: A conical tent traditionally used by Native American tribes.
meanings.sent1: The Native American tribe set up tepees for shelter.
meanings.sent2: We visited a Native American village with many tepees.
meanings.sent3: The tepees looked like giant ice cream cones in the distance.
meanings.sent4: The tepees stood tall like ancient guardians of the land.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tepees dotted the landscape, creating a beautiful scene.

meanings.sent1: The campground was filled with tepees for the summer festival.
meanings.sent2: Many tepees were set up for the gathering of tribes.
meanings.sent3: The tepees huddled together like a group of friends at a party.
meanings.sent4: The tepees stood out in the field, resembling mushrooms after a rain.
meanings.sent5: The rows of tepees created a mesmerizing pattern against the sky.
